The Smurfs Cooking: A Fun and Delicious Game for All Ages

If you are a fan of the Smurfs, the blue-skinned creatures who live in a hidden village in the forest, you will love The Smurfs Cooking, a casual game where you help Chef Smurf prepare for the village festival. The game is available on various platforms, such as CrazyGames, GirlsGoGames, A10.com and Arcade Spot, and can be played on desktop and mobile browsers.

Also read: The Best Cooking Games in 2023

How to Play

The game is a time management game in which you have to serve up the right snacks and drinks for each Smurf that visits your booth. You can choose from three different modes: easy, medium and hard. Each mode has 10 levels, and each level has a target score that you have to reach before the time runs out.

You can bake cupcakes, pancakes and donuts, and decorate them with icing and jam. You can also make tea, fruit punch and milkshakes. To prepare the dishes, you have to use the left mouse button to drag the ingredients to the right place. For example, to make a cupcake, you have to drag a cupcake liner to the tray, then drag some batter to it, then put it in the oven, then take it out when it’s done, then drag some icing and jam to it. To serve the dishes, you have to drag them to the Smurf who ordered them.

Each Smurf has a different preference and patience level. Some Smurfs will order more than one item, and some will change their mind halfway. You have to pay attention to their expressions and bubbles to know what they want and how happy they are. If you make them wait too long or give them the wrong item, they will get angry and leave. If you make them happy, they will give you tips and hearts. You can use the tips to buy upgrades for your booth, such as faster ovens, more trays and better decorations. You can use the hearts to fill up your love meter, which will give you extra time and bonus points.

Why You Should Play

The Smurfs Cooking is a fun and delicious game that will test your speed, memory and multitasking skills. It is also a great way to learn about the Smurfs’ culture and personalities. You will meet familiar characters such as Papa Smurf, Smurfette, Brainy Smurf and Grouchy Smurf, as well as new ones such as Baker Smurf, Farmer Smurf and Handy Smurf. You will also discover their favorite foods and drinks, such as smurfberry jam, smurfmelons and smurfmilk.

The game has colorful graphics, cheerful music and cute sound effects that will make you feel like you are part of the Smurf world. The game is suitable for all ages, as it is easy to learn but challenging to master. You can play it alone or with your friends and family, and compare your scores on the leaderboard.

Conclusion

The Smurfs Cooking is a game that will make you hungry for more. It is a perfect way to spend some quality time with the Smurfs and enjoy their delicious cuisine. Whether you are a fan of the comics, the cartoons or the movies, you will find something to love in this game. So what are you waiting for? Grab your apron and join Chef Smurf in his kitchen!
